name: SlickPic
overview:
SlickPic.com is an online photo sharing website featuring storage, display, sharing and social network options.

SlickPic.com was launched on September 21, 2010. Conceived by a group of digital photographers who were frustrated with the other online photo sites, SlickPic was created as an easy to use but feature-packed photo site for ordinary people who want to upload, organize and exchange pictures. SlickPic’s aim is to offer the features that digital photo lovers want with simple navigation that everyone can understand. The site offers free accounts, unlimited uploads, drag and drop photo management, multiple sharing tools including to social networks and codes for blogs plus professional looking albums, galleries and slideshows for photos.

Independent Bay Area-based business.

  • Founded by digital photographers.
  • Motto is “Share, Store and Do More with Photos”
  • Aims to be easiest and most versatile photo sharing website available.
  • Secure storage and multiple privacy options for users.
  • Customizable User Profiles, one-click buttons for social sharing.
  • Cutting edge programming and daily site improvements.
